title: Mister Blank Exhaustive Collection
description: This impressive book collects all 14 issues of the Mister Blank comic book series, plus the hard-to-find issue zero! Read the entire saga of Sam Smith, featuring killer robots, mime femme fatales, mad science, and global conspiracies; plus sketches and brain-pickings from creator Chris Hicks. A slick and fun adventure for the fanboy and neophyte alike.
author: Christopher Hicks
